Title: Relates to an accusatory instrument filed against a youth to be sealed except when the youth has previously been adjudicated a youthful offender for a felony offense
Summary: Relates to an accusatory instrument filed against a youth to be sealed except when the youth has previously been adjudicated a youthful offender for a felony offense.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to youthful offender procedure and accusatory instruments
